meta.name: description
meta.content: Melissa ISD will empower all students to reach their utmost potential to achieve excellence and life-long success. Located in Melissa, Texas.

img.p: End-of-Year Planning and Announcements Still to Come

img.alt: Banner: Remote Instruction Remainder of School Year
img.p: Remote instruction continues through remainder of 2019-2020 school year
Melissa ISD Board Election postponed until November 2020
Updates in Special Education: SB 139 Notice to Families
Stacy Needham named second assistant principal of Melissa High School
Apply for curbside meals during Melissa ISD remote instruction

div.p: Melissa Schools will continue operating remotely through the last day of school on May 28, 2020 and until further notice. Please visit the link below for the latest updates, campus plans, online resources, and frequently asked questions and answers.

div.style: background: url('https://www.melissaisd.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/Melissa-Ridge-Education-Center-2019-Web.jpg'); background-position: center center; background-size: cover;

div.br:
1904 Cooper St.
Melissa, TX 75454
Virtual Hours: (M-F) 8:30 a.m. - 11:30 a.m. and 1:00 p.m - 4:00 p.m.
→ Remote Instruction
→ Contact Form
→ connect@melissaisd.org

div.div: Superintendent Keith Murphy publishes a weekly newsletter throughout each school year that features news, upcoming events, and photos. Read Just So You Know.
To report bullying, please complete the appropriate form on our Bullying Incident Reporting page.

To report an anonymous tip to the Melissa ISD administration, please click on the link below and complete the form.
Submit an Anonymous Tip
